Phil Bredesen in a letter were negative for harmful substances. the letter addressed to the governor was spotted in the capitol mailroom thursday and a hazardous materials team from the metro nashville fire department was called to remove the envelope from the building. the letter carried the same return address in texas as similar letters received by other governors around the country last week. tim F. Jones said friday in a released statement that the powder sent to Phil Bredesen appears to be harmless. " F.
